long_description: Even a classic can use a little something special. Delicate shoulder pleats and gathering at the lower side seams upgrade the Carve Designs Kumari T-Shirt from basic to bold. Stretch-rayon fabric is soft and breathable. Carve Designs Kumari T-Shirt features a relaxed fit; hem hits at bottom of hip.
short_description: Even a classic can use a little something special. Delicate shoulder pleats and gathering at the lower side seams upgrade the Carve Designs Kumari T-Shirt from basic to bold.
